Articles.Content:
I'd like to get some more capsule mods, specifically for pods that can hold 4 kerbals, 5 kerbals, or 8+. I already have Taurus, NEAR ( it has a 6 man pod type thing).

Do any mods like this exist?

Why not just add more hitchhiker pods on to Taurus ? IMO they hold to many all ready but if you wanted just edit the file and put what you want just might bug if you go IVA with a kerbal that don't have a seat.

EDIT- And Taurus HCV if read it right thats 7 in the command pod and if you added there hitchhiker pod which holds 8 thats 15.

Edited May 18, 2015 by Mecripp2

I did not want to just add the big 8 person hitchhiker module, because it just looks silly! Looking more for a

"Big Gemini" idea I suppose.

Edited May 18, 2015 by MarcAlain

Well like, I said you can just edit the file and cram all you want lol.

EDIT- But they are the biggest, I have seen.
I did just find that FASA has the Big Gemini extension, but, it still only holds 8 and looks decidedly out of place in game.

Look at the size of a kerbal next to any pod and tell me what looks silly lol and you want more then 8 lol to funny makes me think of all the clowns getting out of the car at the circus lol.

EDIT- I have to say thank you lol you made my night, I'll be laughing at that in my sleep

EDIT- But you do think this looks silly

Edited May 18, 2015 by Mecripp2

What ?

EDIT- That, I thought it was funny ?

EDIT- Wasn't trying to be after, I started laughing about all them kerbals getting out of the pod and in your mind your thinking how many more can there be lol

Edited May 18, 2015 by Mecripp2
